trans-unit.source: Represents a service document.
A service document is a document retrieved from a service that indicates the capabilities and locations of the available collections.
A service document may contain one or more workspaces.
Each workspace may contain one or more collections.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> class.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> class, initializing it with the specified collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Workspace"></xref> instances.
A collection of workspaces.
Gets a collection of attribute extensions.
A <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2"></xref> instance.
Gets and sets the base URI for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> instance.
The base URI.
Creates a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Workspace"></xref> instance.
A new workspace.
Gets the element extensions for the service document.
Element extensions are valid XML elements that are not specified in either the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications.
You can add any valid XML element as an extension, provided its namespace is different from the enclosing namespace.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationElementExtensionCollection"></xref> instance containing the element extensions.
Gets a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.AtomPub10ServiceDocumentFormatter"></xref> instance.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocumentFormatter"></xref> instance.
Gets and sets the language of the service document.
The language of the service document.
Loads a service document from the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> into a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> instance.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read the service document from.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> instance.
Loads a service document from the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> into a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> derived instance.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read the service document from.
The type of the service document.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> instance.
Saves the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> instance to the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to save the service document to.
Attempts to parse an attribute extension.
The name of the element.
The namespace of the element.
The attribute to parse.
The syndication version to use when parsing.
`true` if the attribute is successfully parsed; otherwise, `false`.
Returns <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref>.
Attempts to parse an element extension.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read from.
The syndication version to use when parsing.
`true` if the element is successfully parsed; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a collection of workspaces contained within the service document.
A collection of workspaces.
Writes the attribute extensions to the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> using the specified syndication version.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to write to.
The syndication version to use when writing.
Writes the element extensions to the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> using the specified syndication version.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> to write to.
The syndication version to use when writing.
